recipes.label: Shuttered Doors
recipes.startdescription: My mercantile contacts cannot be seen associating with me, and have therefor shuttered their window and barred their door. If I wish to trade, I must find my way in unobserved.

recipes.label: Shuttered Doors
recipes.startdescription: My mercantile contacts cannot be seen associating with me, and have therefor shuttered their window and barred their door. If I wish to trade, I must find my way in unobserved.

recipes.label: Commerce finds a Way
recipes.description: Every proper shop has a backroom window to leave open for just the right kind of unexepcted visitor.

recipes.label: No Route of Access
recipes.description: The shadows are not our friends today. We are spotted on the roof of a nearby window, and trouble starts anew.
